title: The House Of The Dead PC
description:
The first game for pc, contains .bin and .cue files, enjoy
Use daemon tools to mount the image and if using xp, run in windows 95/98 mode

EDIT: The system requirements are:
Minimum:
Win. 95 or 98
90 MHz processor
16MB RAM
20MB HDD free space
640x480 256 colour (8-bit) display resolution
4x CD-ROM
Keyboard and mouse

Recommended:
Win. 95 or 98
133MHz processor
32MB RAM
40MB HDD free space
640x480 256 colour (16-bit) display resolution
4x CD-ROM
Keyboard and mouse

The inside of the case says this:
"THOTD must be installed from windows explorer:
1: If CD auto runs, exit out of Explosiv menu
2: go to Start > My Computer > right click your disc drive, select explore
3: Double click on THOTDRUN.exe"

I found that out myself when i installed it a few days ago, it did not install via the auto run.
